##### FILE: deployment5758.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: brandaoplaster/hello-go:v9.6
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 4
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/goserver failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/goserver failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 128Mi
      nodeSelector:
        env: test

          name: http

##### FILE: deployment5765.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/appname:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: appname
    name: appname
    namespace: default
  name: appname
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 300
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: appname
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appname
        name: appname
        namespace: default
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: istiosidecarval
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/kubernetes-poc/appname
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: appname
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 300Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          periodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: deployment577.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to giropops/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
    fruta: banana
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: giropops
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 0
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: giropops
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 64Mi
      - args:
        - sleep
        - infinity
        image: ubuntu
        name: ubuntu
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 64Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to estacionamento/Deployment/estacionamento-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: estacionamento-deployment
  namespace: estacionamento
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      application: api-estacionamento
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        application: api-estacionamento
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: APSNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: apsnetcore_environment
              name: estacionamento-config
        - name: CONNECTION_SQLSERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: connection_sqlserver
              name: estacionamento-config
        - name: DATA_BASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: data_base
              name: estacionamento-config
        - name: SA_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SA_PASSWORD
              name: sqlserver-secret
        image: estacionamento/api-estacionamento:1.0.0
        name: api-estacionamento
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: http-ingress
  namespace: example001

  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: service-example001
            port:
              number: 8000
        path: /example001(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/log-example:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: log-example
  name: log-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: log-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: log-example
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: lyzhang1999/log-example:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: go-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 64m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: deployment580.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kube-score/ignore: pod-networkpolicy, pod-probes
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    tags.datadoghq.com/service: helloworld
    tags.datadoghq.com/version: v1
    version: v1
  name: helloworld
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        tags.datadoghq.com/service: helloworld
        tags.datadoghq.com/version: v1
        version: v1
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - helloworld
              topologyKey: failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone
            weight: 100
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - helloworld
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 80
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVICE_PORT
          value: :3000
        - name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT
          value: 5s
        - name: DD_SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['tags.datadoghq.com/service']
        - name: DD_VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['tags.datadoghq.com/version']
        - name: TEST_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: my-kubernetes-secret-name
              name: helloworld-secret
        image: europe-docker.pkg.dev/helloworld-shared-0918/helloworld/helloworld:replaceme
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datadog
          name: dsdsocket
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/datadog/
        name: dsdsocket

---

##### FILE: deployment581.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kube-score/ignore: pod-networkpolicy, pod-probes
  labels:
    app: helloworld
    tags.datadoghq.com/service: helloworld
    tags.datadoghq.com/version: v1
    version: v1
  name: helloworld
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        tags.datadoghq.com/service: helloworld
        tags.datadoghq.com/version: v1
        version: v1
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - helloworld
              topologyKey: failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone
            weight: 100
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - helloworld
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 80
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVICE_PORT
          value: :3000
        - name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT
          value: 5s
        - name: DD_SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['tags.datadoghq.com/service']
        - name: DD_VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['tags.datadoghq.com/version']
        - name: TEST_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: my-kubernetes-secret-name
              name: helloworld-secret
        image: europe-docker.pkg.dev/helloworld-shared-0918/helloworld/helloworld:replaceme
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/datadog
          name: dsdsocket
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/datadog/
        name: dsdsocket

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 0
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-grafana
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/RELEASE-NAME-ok:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: RELEASE-NAME
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ok
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.16.0
    helm.sh/chart: ok-0.1.0
  name: RELEASE-NAME-ok
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: RELEASE-NAME
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ok
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: RELEASE-NAME
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ok
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        name: ok
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        resources: {}
        securityContext: {}
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: RELEASE-NAME-ok

---

##### FILE: deployment5840.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/players-v1-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: players-v1
  name: players-v1-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: players-v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: players-v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: NODE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_UID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.uid
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: database-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASS
              name: database-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: database-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_HOST
              name: database-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PORT
              name: database-secret
        image: players:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: players-v1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: deployment5844.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.3.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

##### FILE: deployment5848.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prometheus-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: prometheus-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yaml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
        image: prom/prometheus
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus/
          name: prometheus-storage-volume
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-server
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-configuration
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: prometheus-storage-volume

---

    app.kubernetes.io/name: ok
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.16.0

  name: RELEASE-NAME-ok
  namespace: default

    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: RELEASE-NAME
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ok

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        name: ok
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        resources: {}
        securityContext: {}
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: RELEASE-NAME-ok

##### FILE: deployment5853.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kustomize/StatefulSet/postgresql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: postgresql
  namespace: kustomize
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgresql
  serviceName: postgresql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgresql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: my-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db
              name: my-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: pwd
              name: my-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: value
              name: my-configmap
        image: postgres:12.0-alpine
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-pvc

---

  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system

    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

##### FILE: deployment5861.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx-ingress/Deployment/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: nginx-ingress
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
        app.kubernetes.io/name: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - -nginx-configmaps=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-config
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: nginx/nginx-ingress:3.5.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-ingress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readiness-port
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: prometheus
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nginx-ready
            port: readiness-port
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: srinivas
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dockerapp1-workload:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dockerapp1
  name: dockerapp1-workload
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dockerapp1
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dockerapp1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/csci5409-kubernetes-417610/dockerapp1/app1:VERSION_SHA
        name: dockerapp1-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /vishaka_PV_dir
          name: shared-volume
      volumes:
      - name: shared-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: k8s-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

##### FILE: deployment5880.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/crunchy-alertmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: crunchy-alertmanager
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector: {}
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/alertmanager/alertmanager.yml
        - --storage.path=/alertmanager
        - --log.level=info
        - --cluster.advertise-address=0.0.0.0:9093
        image: prom/alertmanager:v0.24.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /-/healthy
            port: 9093
          initialDelaySeconds: 25
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: alertmanager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9093
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /-/ready
            port: 9093
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager
          name: alertmanagerconf
        - mountPath: /alertmanager
          name: alertmanagerdata
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 26
      serviceAccountName: alertmanager
      volumes:
      - name: alertmanagerdata
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: alertmanagerdata
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: alertmanager-config
        name: alertmanagerconf

---

##### FILE: deployment5881.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/crunchy-grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: crunchy-grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector: {}
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_PATHS_DATA
          value: /data/grafana/data
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER__FILE
          value: /conf/admin/username
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD__FILE
          value: /conf/admin/password
        - name: PROM_HOST
          value: crunchy-prometheus
        - name: PROM_PORT
          value: "9090"
        image: grafana/grafana:9.2.20
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 25
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: grafanadata
        - mountPath: /conf/admin
          name: grafana-admin
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards
          name: grafana-dashboards
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 26
      serviceAccountName: grafana
      volumes:
      - name: grafanadata
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafanadata
      - name: grafana-admin
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: grafana-admin
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-dashboards
        name: grafana-dashboards

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: crunchy-prometheus
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector: {}
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: prom/prometheus:v2.39.2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /-/healthy
            port: 9090
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /-/ready
            port: 9090
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus
          name: prometheusconf
        - mountPath: /prometheus
          name: prometheusdata
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/alert-rules.d
          name: alertmanagerrules
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 26
      serviceAccountName: prometheus
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: crunchy-prometheus
        name: prometheusconf
      - name: prometheusdata
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: prometheusdata
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: alert-rules-config
        name: alertmanagerrules

kind: Deployment

  namespace: three-tier

    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:

        app: mongodb

      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim

##### FILE: deployment5896.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nodejs-calculator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    tags.datadoghq.com/env: prod
    tags.datadoghq.com/service: nodejs-calculator
    tags.datadoghq.com/version: "1.1"
  name: nodejs-calculator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nodejs-calculator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        admission.datadoghq.com/js-lib.version: latest
      labels:
        admission.datadoghq.com/enabled: "true"
        app: nodejs-calculator
        tags.datadoghq.com/env: prod
        tags.datadoghq.com/service: nodejs-calculator
        tags.datadoghq.com/version: "1.1"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DD_AGENT_HOST
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: DD_PROFILING_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: DD_LOGS_INJECTION
          value: "true"
        - name: DD_TRACE_SAMPLE_RATE
          value: "1"
        image: hirdeshkumar2407/nodejs-calculator:latest
        name: nodejs-calculator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

---

##### FILE: deployment59.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.25.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 33
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/custom-snippets/
          name: custom-snippets
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: custom-snippets
        name: custom-snippets

---

  namespace: default

        app: marketplace
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/marketplace-415016/marketplace-image:1
        name: marketplace
        ports:

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - all
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /write
          name: write
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: write

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app: website-apache2
  name: website-apache2
  namespace: prueba-desafiok8s
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: website-apache2
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: website-apache2
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: fcongedo/mi-web-apache2:5
        name: website
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

          value: "6379"

          value: NODEMAILER_FROM= <changsup96@naver.com>

          value: sandbox.smtp.mailtrap.io

          value: "2525"

        - name: NODEMAILER_PASS
          value: null
        - name: GOOGLE_OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID
          value: null
        - name: GOOGLE_OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET
          value: null
        - name: GOOGLE_OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI
          value: null
        - name: NAVER_OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID
          value: null
        - name: NAVER_OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET
          value: null
        - name: NAVER_OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI
          value: null
        - name: NATS_URL
          value: http://nats:4222

          value: tour

              fieldPath: metadata.name

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/booking:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: booking
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: booking
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: booking
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: development
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://booking-mongo:27017/booking
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: booking-redis
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          value: "6379"
        - name: JWT_ACCESS_SECRET
          value: personal-tour-project-in-nodejs-typescript-access
        - name: JWT_REFRESH_SECRET
          value: personal-tour-project-in-nodejs-typescript-refresh
        - name: EXPIRATION_WINDOW
          value: "60"
        - name: NATS_URL
          value: http://nats:4222
        - name: NATS_CLUSTER_ID
          value: tour
        - name: NATS_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: csup96/tour-booking
        name: booking

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: review
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: review
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: review
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: development
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://review-mongo:27017/review
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: review-redis
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          value: "6379"
        - name: JWT_ACCESS_SECRET
          value: personal-tour-project-in-nodejs-typescript-access
        - name: JWT_REFRESH_SECRET
          value: personal-tour-project-in-nodejs-typescript-refresh
        - name: NATS_URL
          value: http://nats:4222
        - name: NATS_CLUSTER_ID
          value: tour
        - name: NATS_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: csup96/tour-review
        name: review

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

##### FILE: deployment5972_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: bpfman-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: bpfman-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: operator
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /bpfman-operator
        env:
        - name: GO_LOG
          value: info
        image: quay.io/bpfman/bpfman-operator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8175
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: bpfman-operator
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8175
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: bpfman-operator
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate

        - /bin/sh
        - -ec
        - while :; do echo '.'; sleep 5 ; done
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: busybox
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: deployment5996.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/freelance-elast:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: freelance-elast
  namespace: production
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: freelance-elast
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: freelance-elast
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xmx1g -Xms1g
        - name: bootstrap.memory_lock
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.http.ssl.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.transport.ssl.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.authc.api_key.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enrollment.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.authc.token.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: freelance-elasticsearch-password
              name: freelance-backend-secret
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: freelance-elast
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: freelance-elast
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 5Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 5Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-local-storage
          subPath: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-local-storage
      volumes:
      - name: elasticsearch-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment5997.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/freelance-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: freelance-mysql
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: freelance-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: freelance-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: freelancer
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: api
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: api
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: freelancer_auth
        image: mysql
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -c
            - |
              mysqladmin -u$MYSQL_USER -p$MYSQL_PASSWORD ping
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: freelance-mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: freelance-mysql
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -c
            - |
              mysql -h127.0.0.1 -u$MYSQL_USER -p$MYSQL_PASSWORD -e'SELECT 1'
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-local-storage
          subPath: mysql
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/freelance-postg:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: freelance-postg
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: freelance-postg
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: freelance-postg
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: freelancer
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: api
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: freelancer_reviews
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -w
            - -U
            - freelancer
            - -d
            - freelancer_reviews
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: freelance-postg
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: freelance-postg
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -w
            - -U
            - freelancer
            - -d
            - freelancer_reviews
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-local-storage
          subPath: postgres
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#00A36C'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      app: mysql

    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

##### FILE: deployment6018.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/bitbucket-runner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/description: Bitbucket self hosted runner
  name: bitbucket-runner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORKING_DIRECTORY
          value: /tmp
        - name: RUNTIME_PREREQUISITES_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: my-bitbucket-runner-secret
        image: myrunner/bitbucket-runner:latest
        name: runner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: docker-containers
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: var-run
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      - image: docker:dind
        name: docker-in-docker
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: docker-containers
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: var-run
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      nodeSelector:
        tenantname: duploservices-mytenant
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-containers
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: var-run

---

(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate

      creationTimestamp: null

          protocol: TCP

kind: Deployment

    app: microservice-app-example
  name: auth-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: microservice-app-example
  template:

      labels:
        app: microservice-app-example
        service: auth-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AUTH_API_PORT
          value: "8081"
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          value: myfancysecret
        - name: USERS_API_ADDRESS
          value: http://users-api:8083
        - name: ZIPKIN_URL
          value: http://zipkin:9411/api/v2/spans
        image: sa93/auth-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: auth-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: deployment603.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/simple-bank-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: simple-bank-api
  name: simple-bank-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: simple-bank-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: simple-bank-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_SOURCE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: postgres-url
              name: simplebank-config
        - name: REDIS_ADDRESS
          value: host.minikube.internal:6379
        image: bmigeri/simple-bank-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: simple-bank-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-server
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: grpc-server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

kind: Deployment

      app: lamp-wp
  template:

        app: lamp-wp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: my-secret

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_HOST
              name: my-secret
        image: webdevops/php-apache:alpine-3-php7
        name: httpd-php-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/docker/etc/php/php.ini
          name: php-config-volume
          subPath: php.ini
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: my-secret
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: php-config
        name: php-config-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ic-deploy-xfusion:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ic-xfusion
  name: ic-deploy-xfusion
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ic-xfusion
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: ic-xfusion
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - while true; do cat /ic/blog; sleep 5; done
        image: fedora:latest
        name: ic-main-xfusion
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /ic
          name: ic-volume-xfusion
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - echo Init Done - Welcome to xFusionCorp Industries > /ic/blog
        image: fedora:latest
        name: ic-msg-xfusion
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /ic
          name: ic-volume-xfusion
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ic-volume-xfusion

---

##### FILE: deployment606.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.25.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 33
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/custom-snippets/
          name: custom-snippets
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: custom-snippets
        name: custom-snippets

---

##### FILE: deployment6073.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-name-here:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-name-here
  name: app-name-here
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: appnamehere
    replicas: 2
    template:
      metadata:
        labels:
          app: app-name-here
      spec:
        containers:
        - env:
          - name: NAME
            value: Gustavo
          - name: AGE
            valueFrom:
              configMapKeyRef:
                key: AGE
                name: appname-env
          envFrom:
          - configMapKeyRef: null
            name: appname-env
          image: image-app-name-here:latest
          livenessProbe:
            failureThreshold: 1
            httpGet:
              path: /healthz
              port: 8000
            periodseconds: 5
            successThreshold: 1
            timeoutSeconds: 1
          name: appnamehere
          readinessProbe:
            failureThreshold: 1
            httpGet:
              path: /healthz
              port: 8000
            periodseconds: 3
          resources:
            limits:
              cpu: 500m
              memory: 32Mi
            requests:
              cpu: 100m
              memory: 16Mi
          startupProbe:
            failureThreshold: 10
            httpGet:
              path: /healthz
              port: 8000
            periodseconds: 3
  template: null

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: server
    template:
      metadata:
        labels:
          app: server
      spec:
        containers:
        - env:
          - name: NAME
            value: Gustavo
          - name: AGE
            valueFrom:
              configMapKeyRef:
                key: AGE
                name: appname-env
          envFrom:
          - configMapKeyRef: null
            name: appname-env
          image: image-app-name-here:latest
          livenessProbe:
            failureThreshold: 1
            httpGet:
              path: /healthz
              port: 8000
            periodseconds: 5
            successThreshold: 1
            timeoutSeconds: 1
          name: server
          readinessProbe:
            failureThreshold: 1
            httpGet:
              path: /healthz
              port: 8000
            periodseconds: 3
          resources:
            limits:
              cpu: 500m
              memory: 32Mi
            requests:
              cpu: 100m
              memory: 16Mi
          startupProbe:
            failureThreshold: 10
            httpGet:
              path: /healthz
              port: 8000
            periodseconds: 3
        serviceAccount: server

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dp-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dp-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - profile
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: profile
      name: profile-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: devopsinsiders/profile:v2
        name: profile-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

  name: counter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: 10.0.2.1:5000/my_image
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: front-end
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: deployment6095.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment6099.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to {namespace}/Deployment/rstudio-operator-controller-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rstudio-operator-controller-deployment
  namespace: '{namespace}'
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rstudio-operator-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rstudio-operator-controller
    spec:

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mysql-persistent-storage

##### FILE: deployment6108.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    env: demo
    role: api
  name: api
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongodb-svc:27017/todo?directConnection=true
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: elnidala/repo-backend:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3500
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
      imagePullSecrets:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment6120.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment-name:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    annotation-key1: annotation-value1
  labels:
    label-key1: label-value1
  name: deployment-name
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      label-key1: label-value1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        label-key1: label-value1
      name: pod-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: image-name
        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: mginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 64Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo 'Hello from BusyBox!'; sleep 10; done
        image: busybox
        name: myapp-container
      tolerations:

kind: Deployment

  name: custom-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5

    matchLabels:
      run: my-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: custom-nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /prodapplication2
          name: myebsvolume2
      volumes:
      - name: myebsvolume2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: myebsvol-pv-claim2

##### FILE: deployment6148.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
          subPath: mysql
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-data-disk

---

##### FILE: deployment6153.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo 'Hello from BusyBox!'; sleep 10; done
        image: busybox
        name: myapp-container
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: special
        operator: Equal
        value: "true"

---

##### FILE: deployment616.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: deployment6161.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/first-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: first-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: first-app
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: first-app
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: LOG_FOLDER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: folder
              name: store-environment
        image: phambchungdev/k8s-app:1.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 2288
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: first-app
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - name: story-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-mutating-webhook:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: example-mutating-webhook
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-mutating-webhook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-mutating-webhook
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TLS_KEY
          value: /app/tls.key
        - name: TLS_CRT
          value: /app/tls.crt
        image: dpluser/example-mutating-webhook:1.0.3-beta
        name: example-mutating-webhook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/tls.key
          name: tls-key
          subPath: tls.key
        - mountPath: /app/tls.crt
          name: tls-crt
          subPath: tls.crt
      volumes:
      - name: tls-key
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          secretName: example-mutating-webhook-tls
      - name: tls-crt
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          secretName: example-mutating-webhook-tls

---

            path: /ok

        - containerPort: 3500

          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500

          periodSeconds: 5

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim
