          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_user
              name: api-config

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_pass
              name: api-config

          valueFrom:

              key: db_name
              name: api-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/qbittorrent:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: qbittorrent
  name: qbittorrent
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: qbittorrent
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: qbittorrent
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        - name: TZ
          value: Etc/UTC
        - name: WEBUI_PORT
          value: "8096"
        - name: TORRENTING_PORT
          value: "6881"
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/qbittorrent:latest
        name: qbittorrent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8096
          name: ui
        - containerPort: 6881
          name: torrent
        - containerPort: 1900
          name: upnp
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: data
          subPath: qbittorrent/
        - mountPath: /downloads
          name: data
          subPath: downloads/
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeName: vengeance
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: radarr-shared-pvc
          readOnly: false

---

      maxSurge: 25%!

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

  conditions:

    lastUpdateTime: "2024-05-13T15:14:51Z"
    message: Deployment has minimum availability.
    reason: MinimumReplicasAvailable
    status: "True"
    type: Available

    app: episode2
  name: episode2-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: episode2
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: episode2
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: masoodghauri/ep2-frontend:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ep2-frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3002
      - image: masoodghauri/ep2-backend:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ep2-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8002
      - image: mongo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27018

##### FILE: deployment6205.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ${NAMESPACE}/Deployment/${DEPLOYMENT_NAME}:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    appname: busybox
  name: ${DEPLOYMENT_NAME}
  namespace: ${NAMESPACE}
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      appname: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        appname: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          emit() {
              echo "$(date) $1" | tee -a /var/log/ramen.log
              sync
          }
          trap "emit STOP; exit" TERM
          emit START
          while true; do
              sleep 10 & wait
              emit UPDATE
          done
        image: quay.io/nirsof/busybox:stable
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: logger
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
      volumes:
      - name: varlog
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ${DEPLOYMENT_NAME}-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment6228.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: nasi101/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

    name: mydeployment

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
      - args:
        - sleep 300
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu
        name: server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi

kind: Deployment

  name: golang-response-echoer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: golang-response-echoer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: golang-response-echoer
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nikolakakisn/golang-response-echoer:0.1.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: golang-response-echoer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: deployment6262.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nestjs-hello-world:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nestjs-hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      api: nestjs-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        api: nestjs-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: dfkn/nestjs-k8s-pv:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /text/temp.txt
          name: text-volume
          subPath: temp.txt
      volumes:
      - name: text-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment6267.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-application:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: my-application
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 50%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 50%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: wordpress
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: mariadb01-1
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_USER
          value: wpadmindb
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          value: example
        image: wordpress:6.2.1-apache
        name: my-wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 516Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 506Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: wordpress
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo -e "Checking for the availability of MySQL Server deployment"; while
          ! nc -z mariadb01-1 3306; do sleep 1; printf "-"; done; echo -e "  >> mariaDB
          Server has started";
        image: busybox:1.31
        name: init-db
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: wordpress

---

##### FILE: deployment6268.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 50%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 50%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: wordpress
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: mariadb
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_USER
          value: wpadmindb
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          value: example
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_NAME
          value: app01db
        image: wordpress:6.2.1-apache
        name: my-wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 516Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 506Mi
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - ps -aux | grep wordpress
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: wordpress
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: wordpress

---

        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}

##### FILE: deployment6271.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to 2917-cmap-dev/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: 2917-cmap-dev
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: yourregistry.com/user/nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: shared-volume
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - |
          echo -e '#!/bin/bash\ntail --follow=name -n 100 --retry /var/log/nginx/error.log' > /var/log/nginx/sidecarlogging.sh
          chmod 775 /var/log/nginx/sidecarlogging.sh
          /var/log/nginx/sidecarlogging.sh
        image: registry.access.redhat.com/ubi9-minimal:9.3-1612
        name: errorlog
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: shared-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          #!/bin/sh
          mkdir -p /var/log/nginx
          ln -s /dev/stdout /var/log/nginx/access.log
        image: busybox:latest
        name: init-nginx-create-symlink
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: shared-volume
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-affinity-test:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: node-affinity-test
  name: node-affinity-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-affinity-test
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: node-affinity-test
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: size
                operator: In
                values:
                - Large
                - Medium
      containers:
      - image: docker-registry:5000/nginx
        name: nginx
        resources: {}
status: {}

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app
  namespace: local
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: secrets
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: secrets
        - name: APP_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: APP_PORT
              name: config
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: config
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: config
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: config
        image: nl7robbins/recipe-practice-app:latest
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred

##### FILE: deployment6290.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: consumer_key
              name: twitter-credentials
        - name: TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: consumer_secret
              name: twitter-credentials
        - name: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: access_token
              name: twitter-credentials
        - name: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: access_token_secret
              name: twitter-credentials
        image: georgi86/twitter:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: twitter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      topologySpreadConstraints:
      - labelSelector:
          matchLabels:
            app: app
        maxSkew: 1
        topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        whenUnsatisfiable: DoNotSchedule

---

    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /srv/postgresql/data
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: postgres-setup
        image: postgres:16
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /srv/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-data-claim

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mlflow
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mlflow
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - pip install --quiet psycopg2-binary && mlflow ui --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000
          --workers 1 --backend-store-uri '$(BACKEND_STORE_URI)' --serve-artifacts
          --default-artifact-root mlflow-artifacts:/ --artifacts-destination /srv/mlflow/artifacts
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mlflow
        image: ghcr.io/mlflow/mlflow:v2.13.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mlflow
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /srv/mlflow/artifacts
          name: mlflow-artifacts
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mlflow-artifacts
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mlflow-artifacts-claim

      labels:
        role: api

          value: mongodb://mongodb-svc:27017/todo?directConnection=true
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: 179623033511.dkr.ecr.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/backend:29
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3500
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ecr-registry-secret

              name: mongo-sec

##### FILE: deployment6302.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flux-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: flux-operator
  name: flux-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: flux-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: flux-operator
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RUNTIME_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: flux-operator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp
      serviceAccountName: flux-operator
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp

---

          periodSeconds: 30

            memory: 64Mi

            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - random_exec_command
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 60

          name: data-volume
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: data-volume

          claimName: data-pvc

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: markhor-default
    app.kubernetes.io/name: markhor
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: markhor
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.0.1
  name: markhor
  namespace: markhor

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: markhor
  template:

      labels:
        app: markhor
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SOPS_AGE_KEY_FILE
          value: /age-secrets/age_keys.txt
        image: ghcr.io/markhork8s/markhor:1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: markhor.markhor.svc
            path: /health
            port: 8000
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
        name: markhor
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: health
        - containerPort: 443
          name: validationhook
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: markhor.markhor.svc
            path: /health
            port: 8000
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/markhor
          name: markhor-config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /age-secrets
          name: markhor-age
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/markhor/tls
          name: markhor-tls
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: markhor-service-account
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: markhor-config
        name: markhor-config
      - name: markhor-age
        secret:
          secretName: markhor-age-secret
      - name: markhor-tls
        secret:
          secretName: markhor-tls-secret

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
    fruit: banana
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: giropops
spec:
  replicas: 10
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 0
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 600m
            memory: 250Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 100Mi

##### FILE: deployment632.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/jenkins:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: jenkins
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

            memory: 2Gi

            memory: 500Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/health-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: health-service
    service: health-service
    version: v1
  name: health-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: health-service
      service: health-service
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: health-service
        service: health-service
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ENVIRONMENT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['environment']
        - name: VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['version']
        - name: SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['service']
        image: service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: health-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      serviceAccountName: health-service

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - redis-server
        - /redis-master/redis.conf
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: "true"
        image: redis:7
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /redis-master-data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /redis-master
          name: configuration
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: redis-config
            path: redis.conf
          name: redis-configuration
        name: configuration

---

        env:

          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_ISTIOD_ADDR
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_ISTIOD_CONFIGMAP_NAME
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_CLUSTER_ID
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_ISTIO_CONFIG_STORE_SECRET
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_XDS_ADDR
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_XDS_PORT
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_LOG_LEVEL
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: AERAKI_SERVER_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        name: dynamic_parameters
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15010
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15017
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources: null
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istio
          name: istiod-ca-cert
          readOnly: true
      nodeSelector: null
      serviceAccountName: aeraki
      tolerations: null
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: istio-ca-root-cert
        name: istiod-ca-cert

      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/aeraki

          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: AERAKI_ISTIOD_ADDR
          value: dynamic_parameters

          value: dynamic_parameters

          value: dynamic_parameters

    type: Recreate

        checksum/config: dynamic_parameters

        app: antrea
        component: antrea-controller

      affinity: null

      - args:
        - --config=/etc/antrea/antrea-controller.conf

        - --log_file_max_num=dynamic_parameters

        - antrea-controller

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: ANTREA_CONFIG_MAP_NAME
          value: antrea-config
        - name: dynamic_parameters
          value: dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            host: localhost
            path: /livez
            port: api
            scheme: HTTPS
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5

          failureThreshold: 5

            host: localhost
            path: /readyz
            port: api
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5

          name: antrea-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: antrea-controller.conf

          name: antrea-controller-tls
        - mountPath: /var/log/antrea
          name: host-var-log-antrea

      priorityClassName: dynamic_parameters
      serviceAccountName: antrea-controller
      tolerations: null

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/argoprojlabs/argocd-e2e-container:0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: main
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /does-not-exist
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 1

##### FILE: deployment6348.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/dynamic_parameters:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: dynamic_parameters
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: dynamic_parameters
  selector:
    matchLabels: null
  strategy: null
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        checksum/config: dynamic_parameters
      labels: null
      name: dynamic_parameters
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - dynamic_parameters
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - /config/application_config.yaml
        env:
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: rest
            scheme: dynamic_parametersHTTPSdynamic_parametersHTTPdynamic_parameters
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: armada
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: dynamic_parameters
          name: pprof
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: rest
            scheme: dynamic_parametersHTTPSdynamic_parametersHTTPdynamic_parameters
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources: null
        securityContext: null
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config/application_config.yaml
          name: user-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: dynamic_parameters
        - mountPath: /pulsar/tokens
          name: pulsar-token
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /pulsar/ca
          name: pulsar-ca
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: tls-certs
          readOnly: true
      securityContext: null
      serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: dynamic_parameters
      tolerations: null
      volumes:
      - name: user-config
        secret:
          secretName: dynamic_parameters
      - name: pulsar-token
        secret:
          items:
          - key: TOKEN
            path: pulsar-token
          secretName: dynamic_parameters
      - name: pulsar-ca
        secret:
          items:
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          secretName: dynamic_parameters
      - name: tls-certs
        secret:
          secretName: armada-service-tls

---

        - --config
        - /config/application_config.yaml

          name: pprof

##### FILE: deployment6354.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dynamic_parameters:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dynamic_parameters
    chart: dynamic_parameters
    heritage: dynamic_parameters
    release: dynamic_parameters
  name: dynamic_parameters
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: dynamic_parameters
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dynamic_parameters
      release: dynamic_parameters
  serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters
  strategy: dynamic_parameters
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: dynamic_parameters
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: dynamic_parameters
        chart: dynamic_parameters
        release: dynamic_parameters
    spec:
      affinity: dynamic_parameters
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ZMS_DB_ADMIN_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jdbc
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_RODB_ADMIN_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jdbcRo
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_KEYSTORE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: keystore
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_TRUSTSTORE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: truststore
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_PORT
          value: "4443"
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          httpGet:
            path: /zms/v1/status
            port: zms
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: dynamic_parameters
          periodSeconds: dynamic_parameters
          successThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          timeoutSeconds: dynamic_parameters
        name: zms
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4443
          name: zms
        - containerPort: dynamic_parameters
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          httpGet:
            path: /zms/v1/status
            port: zms
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: dynamic_parameters
          periodSeconds: dynamic_parameters
          successThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          timeoutSeconds: dynamic_parameters
        resources: dynamic_parameters
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/conf/zms_server
          name: config
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/var/keys
          name: zms-key
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/var/certs
          name: tls-stores
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/logs/zms_server
          name: log
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - ""
        env:
        - name: ZMS_KEYSTORE_PATH
          value: /opt/athenz/zms/var/certs/zms_keystore.pkcs12
        - name: ZMS_KEYSTORE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: keystore
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_CERT_PATH
          value: /opt/athenz/zms/var/tls/tls.crt
        - name: ZMS_CERT_KEY_PATH
          value: /opt/athenz/zms/var/tls/tls.key
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        name: tls-keystore
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/var/tls
          name: tls
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/var/certs
          name: tls-stores
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - ""
        env:
        - name: ZMS_TRUSTSTORE_PATH
          value: /opt/athenz/zms/var/certs/zms_truststore.jks
        - name: ZMS_TRUSTSTORE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: truststore
              name: dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        name: tls-truststore
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/var/tls/CAs
          name: tls-ca
        - mountPath: /opt/athenz/zms/var/certs
          name: tls-stores
      nodeSelector: dynamic_parameters
      schedulerName: dynamic_parameters
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: dynamic_parameters
        runAsGroup: dynamic_parameters
        runAsUser: dynamic_parameters
      tolerations: dynamic_parameters
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: dynamic_parameters-config
        name: config
      - name: zms-key
        secret:
          items:
          - key: zms_private.pem
            mode: 400
            path: zms_private.pem
          secretName: dynamic_parameters
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: dynamic_parameters
      - name: tls-ca
        secret:
          secretName: dynamic_parameters
      - name: tls-stores
        secret:
          items:
          - key: zms_keystore.pkcs12
            mode: 400
            path: zms_keystore.pkcs12
          - key: zms_truststore.jks
            mode: 400
            path: zms_truststore.jks

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dynamic_parameters

  name: dynamic_parameters
  namespace: default

  replicas: dynamic_parameters

    matchLabels:
      app: dynamic_parameters
      release: dynamic_parameters
  serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters
  strategy: dynamic_parameters
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: dynamic_parameters
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: dynamic_parameters
        chart: dynamic_parameters
        release: dynamic_parameters
    spec:
      affinity: dynamic_parameters
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ZMS_DB_ADMIN_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jdbc
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_RODB_ADMIN_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jdbcRo
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_KEYSTORE_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: keystore
              name: dynamic_parameters

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: truststore
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ZMS_PORT
          value: "4443"
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          httpGet:
            path: /zms/v1/status
            port: zms
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: dynamic_parameters
          periodSeconds: dynamic_parameters
          successThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          timeoutSeconds: dynamic_parameters
        name: zms
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4443
          name: zms
        - containerPort: dynamic_parameters
          name: metrics

          failureThreshold: dynamic_parameters

          periodSeconds: dynamic_parameters
          successThreshold: dynamic_parameters
          timeoutSeconds: dynamic_parameters

##### FILE: deployment6364.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/bind:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: bind
  name: bind
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: bind
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: bind
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - |
          rm -rf /etc/bind
          mkdir -p /etc/bind
          ls -lah /config/
          cp -Lr /config/* /etc/bind/
          chown -R "${BIND_USER}:${BIND_USER}" /etc/bind
          exec $(which named) -u ${BIND_USER} -g
        env:
        - name: WEBMIN_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        image: '{IMAGE}'
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: bind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 53
          protocol: UDP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: data
      dnsConfig:
        options:
        - name: ndots
          value: "1"
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: bind
        name: data

  name: dynamic_parameters
  namespace: default

        app: dynamic_parameters
        release: dynamic_parameters

      - args:
        - -config=/config/config.json
        - -strict=dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        name: dynamic_parameters

          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /dir
            port: 14000
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1

          runAsNonRoot: true

          name: config
          readOnly: true
      dnsConfig:
        options:
        - name: ndots
          value: "1"
      nodeSelector: null
      volumes:

##### FILE: deployment6373.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/crossplane:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: crossplane
    app.kubernetes.io/component: cloud-infrastructure-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: crossplane
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: crossplane
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.0.1
    helm.sh/chart: crossplane-0.0.1
    release: my-release
  name: crossplane
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: crossplane
      release: my-release
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: crossplane
        app.kubernetes.io/component: cloud-infrastructure-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: crossplane
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: crossplane
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.0.1
        helm.sh/chart: crossplane-0.0.1
        release: my-release
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - core
        - start
        env:
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: crossplane
              divisor: "1"
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: crossplane
              divisor: "1"
              resource: limits.memory
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: LEADER_ELECTION
          value: "true"
        - name: TLS_SERVER_SECRET_NAME
          value: crossplane-tls-server
        - name: TLS_SERVER_CERTS_DIR
          value: /tls/server
        - name: TLS_CLIENT_SECRET_NAME
          value: crossplane-tls-client
        - name: TLS_CLIENT_CERTS_DIR
          value: /tls/client
        image: xpkg.upbound.io/crossplane/crossplane:v0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: crossplane
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readyz
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: webhooks
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65532
          runAsUser: 65532
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 2
          tcpSocket:
            port: readyz

          name: package-cache
        - mountPath: /tls/server
          name: tls-server-certs
        - mountPath: /tls/client
          name: tls-client-certs

      initContainers:
      - args:
        - core
        - init
        env:
        - name: GOMAXPROCS
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: crossplane-init
              divisor: "1"
              resource: limits.cpu
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          valueFrom:
            resourceFieldRef:
              containerName: crossplane-init
              divisor: "1"
              resource: limits.memory

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace

          valueFrom:

              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName

          value: crossplane-webhooks

          value: "9443"

          value: crossplane-root-ca
        - name: TLS_SERVER_SECRET_NAME
          value: crossplane-tls-server
        - name: TLS_CLIENT_SECRET_NAME
          value: crossplane-tls-client

        name: crossplane-init
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:

            memory: 256Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

          runAsUser: 65532

##### FILE: Deployment6395.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-release:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: my-release
  name: my-release
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-release
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-release
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - |-
          /opt/easegress/bin/easegress-server \
            -f /opt/eg-config/easegress-server.yaml \
            --initial-object-config-files /opt/eg-config/controller.yaml \
            --initial-cluster $(EG_NAME)=http://localhost:2380
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        env:
        - name: EG_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: megaease/easegress:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: ingress-easegress
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1200m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/eg-config/easegress-server.yaml
          name: my-release
          subPath: easegress-server.yaml
        - mountPath: /opt/eg-config/controller.yaml
          name: my-release
          subPath: controller.yaml
        - mountPath: /opt/easegress/data
          name: ingress-data-volume
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: my-release
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ingress-data-volume
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: easegress-server.yaml
            path: easegress-server.yaml
          - key: controller.yaml
            path: controller.yaml
          name: my-release
        name: my-release

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/my-release

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/my-release failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/my-release failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/my-release failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/my-release failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/my-release failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/my-release failed:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: emissary-apiext
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kubectl_apply_-f_emissary-apiext.yaml
    app.kubernetes.io/name: emissary-apiext
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: emissary-apiext
  name: emissary-apiext
  namespace: emissary-system
spec:
  ports:
  - name: https
    port: 443
    targetPort: https
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: emissary-apiext
    app.kubernetes.io/name: emissary-apiext
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: emissary-apiext

##### FILE: deployment6398_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to emissary-system/Deployment/emissary-apiext:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: emissary-apiext
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kubectl_apply_-f_emissary-apiext.yaml
    app.kubernetes.io/name: emissary-apiext
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: emissary-apiext
  name: emissary-apiext
  namespace: emissary-system
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: emissary-apiext
      app.kubernetes.io/name: emissary-apiext
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: emissary-apiext
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: emissary-apiext
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kubectl_apply_-f_emissary-apiext.yaml
        app.kubernetes.io/name: emissary-apiext
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: emissary-apiext
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --crd-label-selector
        - app.kubernetes.io/part-of=emissary-apiext
        command:
        - apiext
        - emissary-apiext
        image: e2e-registry:10000/apiext:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /probes/live
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: emissary-apiext
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /probes/ready
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 3
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /probes/live
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
      serviceAccountName: emissary-apiext

---

##### FILE: deployment6399.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-release-external-secrets:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.9.14
    helm.sh/chart: external-secrets-0.9.14
  name: my-release-external-secrets
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
      app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: external-secrets
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.9.14
        helm.sh/chart: external-secrets-0.9.14
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --concurrent=1
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        image: ghcr.io/external-secrets/external-secrets:v0.9.14
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: external-secrets
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      hostNetwork: false
      serviceAccountName: my-release-external-secrets

---

##### FILE: deployment6402.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/model-serving:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: model-serving
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: model-serving
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: model-serving
        serverless.fluid.io/inject: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TARGET
          value: World
        image: fluidcloudnative/serving
        name: serving
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: serverless-data

---

##### FILE: deployment6403.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#34577c'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.0.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#34577c'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.0.10
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    environment: ${cluster_env:=dev}
    region: ${cluster_region}
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#34577c'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.0.10
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kustomize.toolkit.fluxcd.io/name: podinfo
    kustomize.toolkit.fluxcd.io/namespace: dynamic_parameters
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#34577c'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.0.10
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dynamic_parameters:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: dynamic_parameters
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: dynamic_parameters
  selector:
    matchLabels: null
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels: null
    spec:
      affinity: null
      containers:
      - args:
        - -in-cluster
        - -plugins-dir=dynamic_parameters
        - -oidc-client-id=$(OIDC_CLIENT_ID)
        - -oidc-client-secret=$(OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET)
        - -oidc-idp-issuer-url=$(OIDC_ISSUER_URL)
        - -oidc-scopes=$(OIDC_SCOPES)
        - -base-url=dynamic_parameters
        env:
        - name: OIDC_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientID
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientSecret
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: OIDC_ISSUER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: issuerURL
              name: dynamic_parameters
        - name: OIDC_SCOPES
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: scopes
              name: dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters/dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: dynamic_parameters/
            port: http
        name: dynamic_parameters
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4466
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: dynamic_parameters/
            port: http
        resources: null
        securityContext: null
        volumeMounts: null
      imagePullSecrets: null
      initContainers: null
      nodeSelector: null
      securityContext: null
      serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters
      tolerations: null
      volumes: null

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/edge:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: edge
  name: edge
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: edge
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: edge
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: internetsystemsconsortium/bind9:9.16
        name: bind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1053
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/bind
          name: config
        - mountPath: /var/lib/bind/zones
          name: zone-volume
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - cp
        - /etc/bind/k8s.zone
        - /var/lib/bind/zones/k8s.zone
        image: gcr.io/google_containers/busybox
        name: copy-zone
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/bind
          name: config
        - mountPath: /var/lib/bind/zones
          name: zone-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: zone-volume
      - name: config
        projected:
          sources:
          - secret:
              name: ddns-key
          - configMap:
              name: zone

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-release-k8sgpt:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: k8sgpt
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.3.0
    helm.sh/chart: k8sgpt-1.0.0
  name: my-release-k8sgpt
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
      app.kubernetes.io/name: k8sgpt
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/name: k8sgpt
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - serve
        env:
        - name: K8SGPT_MODEL
          value: gpt-3.5-turbo
        - name: K8SGPT_BACKEND
          value: openai
        - name: XDG_CONFIG_HOME
          value: /k8sgpt-config/
        - name: XDG_CACHE_HOME
          value: /k8sgpt-config/
        image: ghcr.io/k8sgpt-ai/k8sgpt:v0.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: k8sgpt-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 156Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /k8sgpt-config
          name: config
      serviceAccountName: my-release-k8sgpt
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config

---

      app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
      app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up

        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up

        - operator
        env:
        - name: BACKUP_IMAGE
          value: ghcr.io/k8up-io/k8up:v2.8.0
        - name: BACKUP_ENABLE_LEADER_ELECTION
          value: "true"
        - name: BACKUP_SKIP_WITHOUT_ANNOTATION
          value: "false"
        - name: BACKUP_OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/k8up-io/k8up:v2.8.0

            path: /metrics
            port: http

          periodSeconds: 10

        ports:

          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext: {}
      securityContext: {}

##### FILE: deployment6430.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mariadb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: mariadb
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mariadb
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8up.io/backupcommand: /bin/bash -c 'mysqldump -uroot -p"${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}"
          --all-databases'
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mariadb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mariadb-pass
        image: mariadb:10.4
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mariadb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -i
            - -c
            - mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -uroot -p"${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}" -D mysql -e 'SELECT
              1'
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mariadb-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mariadb-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mariadb-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment6431.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minio
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minio
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - server
        - /data
        - --console-address=:9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: minio-credentials
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: minio-credentials
        image: minio/minio
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /minio/health/live
            port: 9000
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
        - containerPort: 9001
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /minio/health/ready
            port: 9000
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 20
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: minio-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: frontend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: mariadb
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mariadb-pass
        image: wordpress:5.4-apache
        name: wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: wordpress
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: wordpress-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: wordpress-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: wordpress-pvc

##### FILE: deployment6433.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to k8up-e2e-subject/Deployment/annotated-subject-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: annotated-subject-deployment
  namespace: k8up-e2e-subject
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: subject
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8up.io/backupcommand: /tmp/test.sh
        k8up.io/backupcommand-container: subject-container
        k8up.io/file-extension: .txt
      labels:
        app: subject
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - sleep infinity
        image: busybox
        name: dummy-container-blocking-first-position
      - args:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          printf "$BACKUP_FILE_CONTENT" | tee "/data/$BACKUP_FILE_NAME" && \
          printf '#!/bin/sh\nsleep 30s\necho %!s(MISSING)\n' "$BACKUP_FILE_CONTENT" | tee /tmp/test.sh && chmod a+x /tmp/test.sh && \
          echo && \
          ls -la /data && \
          echo "test file /data/$BACKUP_FILE_NAME written, sleeping now" && \
          sleep infinity
        env:
        - name: BACKUP_FILE_CONTENT
          value: ""
        - name: BACKUP_FILE_NAME
          value: ""
        image: quay.io/prometheus/busybox:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: subject-container
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: $ID
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: volume
      volumes:
      - name: volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: subject-pvc

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: subject-deployment
  namespace: k8up-e2e-subject
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: subject
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: subject
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          printf "$BACKUP_FILE_CONTENT" | tee "/data/$BACKUP_FILE_NAME" && \
          echo && \
          ls -la /data && \
          echo "test file /data/$BACKUP_FILE_NAME written, sleeping now" && \
          sleep infinity
        env:
        - name: BACKUP_FILE_CONTENT
          value: ""
        - name: BACKUP_FILE_NAME
          value: ""
        image: quay.io/prometheus/busybox:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: subject-container
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: $ID
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: volume
      volumes:
      - name: volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: subject-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pgtestapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pgtestapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pgtestapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pgtestapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PG_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: postgres.host
              name: dbconfig
        - name: PG_DBNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: postgres.databases
              name: dbconfig
        - name: PG_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: dbcreds
        - name: PG_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: dbcreds
        image: ghcr.io/kanisterio/pgtest-amd64:0.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: pgtestapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: deployment6438.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx

---
