##### FILE: deployment6440.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to keda/Deployment/keda-metrics-apiserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: keda-metrics-apiserver
    app.kubernetes.io/name: keda-metrics-apiserver
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: keda-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: latest
  name: keda-metrics-apiserver
  namespace: keda
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: keda-metrics-apiserver
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: keda-metrics-apiserver
      name: keda-metrics-apiserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/keda-adapter
        - --secure-port=6443
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --stderrthreshold=ERROR
        - --v=0
        - --client-ca-file=/certs/ca.crt
        - --tls-cert-file=/certs/tls.crt
        - --tls-private-key-file=/certs/tls.key
        - --cert-dir=/certs
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          value: ""
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: KEDA_HTTP_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
          value: ""
        image: ghcr.io/kedacore/keda-metrics-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 6443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
        name: keda-metrics-apiserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 6443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: temp-vol
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certificates
          readOnly: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: keda-operator
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: temp-vol
      - name: certificates
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: kedaorg-certs

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/syscont-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: syscont
  name: syscont-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: syscont
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        io.kubernetes.cri-o.userns-mode: auto:size=65536
      labels:
        app: syscont
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/init
        image: registry.nestybox.com/nestybox/ubuntu-bionic-systemd-docker
        name: ubu-bio-systemd-docker
      runtimeClassName: sysbox-runc

##### FILE: deployment6458.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/alpine-writer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alpine-writer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpine-writer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: alpine-writer
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo $(date) >> /mnt/data/date.txt; sleep 1; done
        image: alpine
        name: alpine-writer
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/data
          name: data-volume
      volumes:
      - name: data-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: myclaim

---

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/alpine-writer failed:

      run: rabbitmq
  template:

      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:

        environment: test
        run: rabbitmq
        tier: queue
      name: rabbitmq
      namespace: infra

          value: devstore
        - name: RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_PASS
          value: devstore
        image: rabbitmq:3-management
        name: rabbitmq
        resources: {}
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: deployment6465.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/cluster-autoscaler:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cluster-autoscaler
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cluster-autoscaler
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: cluster-autoscaler
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./cluster-autoscaler
        - --cloud-provider=aws
        - --nodes=1:10:<node-group-name>
        - --scale-down-enabled=true
        - --scale-down-delay-after-add=10m
        - --scale-down-unneeded-time=10m
        - --scale-down-utilization-threshold=0.5
        - --skip-nodes-with-local-storage=false
        - --skip-nodes-with-system-pods=false
        - --balance-similar-node-groups=true
        env:
        - name: AWS_REGION
          value: <your-aws-region>
        image: k8s.gcr.io/autoscaling/cluster-autoscaler:v1.22.0
        name: cluster-autoscaler
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
          name: ssl-certs
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
        name: ssl-certs

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-info
  name: pod-info-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-info
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-info
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: kimschles/pod-info-app:latest
        name: pod-info-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

##### FILE: deployment6477.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

    apiserver: "true"
  name: wardle-server
  namespace: wardle

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      apiserver: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        apiserver: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --etcd-servers=http://localhost:2379
        image: kube-sample-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: wardle-server
      - image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.5.13
        name: etcd
      serviceAccountName: apiserver

---

##### FILE: deployment6482.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/bill-pay-application:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: bill-pay-app
  name: bill-pay-application
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: bill-pay-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: bill-pay-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: phatijava/bill-pay-app:4.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: http
        name: bill-pay-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: http

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

    app: keycloak

    version: v1
  name: keycloak
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: keycloak
      service: keycloak
      version: v1

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: keycloak
        service: keycloak
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - start-dev
        env:
        - name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN
          value: admin
        - name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        - name: KC_PROXY
          value: edge
        image: quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:25.0.2
        name: keycloak
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /realms/master
            port: 8080

          name: linkding-volume

    type: RollingUpdate

##### FILE: deployment6503.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frp-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: frp-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: frp-operator
  name: frp-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: frp-operator
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: frp-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: frp-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: frp-operator
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --server-addr
        - 192.168.100.1
        - --server-port
        - "7000"
        command:
        - /app/frp-operator
        env:
        - name: RUST_LOG
          value: frp_operator=debug
        - name: AUTH_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: frp-token
        image: frp-operator
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: frp-operator
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: frp-operator
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

      app: radicale
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: radicale
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: tomsquest/docker-radicale:latest
        name: radicale
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5232
          name: dav

        - mountPath: /data/collections
          name: collections
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - name: collections

          claimName: radicale-pvc

          name: radicale-config
        name: config

          periodSeconds: 10

          value: my_postgres_password

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/meu-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: meu-deployment
    svc: uni
    web: duni
  name: meu-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: meu-pod
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: meu-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.1
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment6515.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/meu-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: meu-deployment
    svc: uni
    web: duni
  name: meu-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: meu-pod
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: meu-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.1
            memory: 64Mi
        startupProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/meu-deployment

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/meu-deployment
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/meu-deployment failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/meu-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/meu-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/meu-deployment failed:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.1
            memory: 64Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ha-linky:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ha-linky
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ha-linky
      app.kubernetes.io/name: home-assistant
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ha-linky
        app.kubernetes.io/name: home-assistant
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Europe/Paris
        - name: SUPERVISOR_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: access_token
              name: home-assistant-credentials
        - name: WS_URL
          value: ws://home-assistant:8080/api/websocket
        image: ghcr.io/iverly/maxime.in/ha-linky:f030a4a
        name: ha-linky
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/options.json
          name: secrets
          subPath: linky.json
      volumes:
      - name: secrets
        secret:
          secretName: home-assistant-secrets

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/default-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: default-app
  name: default-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: default-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: default-app
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: mmckernan/default-app:0.1.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
        name: default-app-ctr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 2001
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2001
      serviceAccountName: default-app-sa

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:

      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: guilhermemmnn/hello-go:v7
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---

      app: student-app
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: student-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: my-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP

##### FILE: deployment654.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ghost:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ghost
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ghost
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ghost
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: database__connection__user
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: ghost-db
        - name: database__connection__password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: ghost-db
        image: ghost:5.113
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: X-Forwarded-Proto
              value: https
            path: /
            port: 2368
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: ghost
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2368
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: X-Forwarded-Proto
              value: https
            path: /
            port: 2368
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1024m
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/ghost/content
          name: media
        - mountPath: /var/lib/ghost/config.production.json
          name: config
          subPath: config.production.json
      volumes:
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: media-pvc
          readOnly: false
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.production.json
            path: config.production.json
          name: ghost-conf
        name: config

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: changedetection-io
  namespace: changedetection-io
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: changedetection-io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: changedetection-io
      pod.name: main
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: changedetection-io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: changedetection-io

##### FILE: deployment6552.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pdns-auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pdns-auth
  name: pdns-auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pdns-auth
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: pdns-auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: powerdns/pdns-auth-49:4.9.4
        name: pdns-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 53
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 53
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 8081
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/powerdns
          name: pdns-auth-shared
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          # Create necessary directories
          mkdir -p /etc/powerdns/pdns.d

          # Copy the config file from ConfigMap
          cp /etc/pdns-config/pdns.conf /etc/powerdns/pdns.conf
          cp /etc/pdns-config-general/pdns-general.conf /etc/powerdns/pdns.d/pdns-general.conf

          # Generate the secrets.conf file
          echo "api-key=$(cat /etc/pdns/secrets/api-key)" > /etc/powerdns/pdns.d/secrets.conf
          echo "webserver-password=$(cat /etc/pdns/secrets/webserver-password)" >> /etc/powerdns/pdns.d/secrets.conf
          echo "gpgsql-password=$(cat /etc/pdns/secrets/gpgsql-password)" >> /etc/powerdns/pdns.d/secrets.conf
          echo "Secrets and config initialized successfully."

          # Set proper ownership and permissions
          chown -R 953:953 /etc/powerdns  # Adjust to match the PowerDNS user UID/GID
          chmod -R 755 /etc/powerdns      # Allow read/execute for others, but only owner can write
        image: busybox
        name: init-secrets
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/pdns/secrets
          name: pdns-auth-secrets-volume
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/pdns-config
          name: pdns-auth-config-volume
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/pdns-config-general
          name: pdns-auth-config-volume-general
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/powerdns
          name: pdns-auth-shared
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: pdns-auth-shared
      - name: pdns-auth-secrets-volume
        secret:
          secretName: pdns-auth-secrets
      - configMap:
          name: pdns-auth-config
        name: pdns-auth-config-volume
      - configMap:
          name: pdns-auth-config-general
        name: pdns-auth-config-volume-general

---

##### FILE: deployment656.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/cloudprober:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cloudprober
  name: cloudprober
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cloudprober
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9313"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: cloudprober
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config_file
        - /config/cloudprober.cfg
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: cf-access-keys
        image: cloudprober/cloudprober:v0.13.9
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: metrics
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: cloudprober
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9313
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: metrics
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: cloudprober-config
        name: config

---

##### FILE: deployment657_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_LOG_LEVEL
          value: DEBUG
        - name: GF_LOG_MODE
          value: console
        - name: GF_SERVER_HTTP_PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: GF_PATHS_CONFIG
          value: /local/grafana.ini
        - name: GF_PATHS_PROVISIONING
          value: /local/grafana/provisioning
        image: grafana/grafana:11.5.2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /local/grafana.ini
          name: grafana-config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage-volume
        - mountPath: /local/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasources.yaml
          name: grafana-datasources
          subPath: datasources.yaml
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown 472:0 /data
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: grafana-storage-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-config
        name: grafana-config
      - name: grafana-storage-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

##### FILE: deployment6576.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: lucasasilvaa/hello-go:v5.7
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 4
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---

##### FILE: deployment6577.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
        app.kubernetes.io/name: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --enable-prometheus-metrics
        - -nginx-configmaps=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-config
        - -default-server-tls-secret=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/default-server-secret
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: nginx/nginx-ingress:3.5.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-ingress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          hostPort: 443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readiness-port
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: prometheus
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nginx-ready
            port: readiness-port
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: master
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: unifi-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: unifi-controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: unifi-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: unifi-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: unifi-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: ${TIMEZONE}
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        - name: MEM_LIMIT
          value: "1900"
        - name: MEM_STARTUP
          value: "1024"
        - name: MONGO_USER
          value: unifi
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongodb.mongodb
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        - name: MONGO_DBNAME
          value: unifi
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: unifi-db-secrets
        image: linuxserver/unifi-network-application:9.0.114@sha256:d673e01c837337d982bf52ff25b11a3fd61e573fd3f355f998d869549d5948b6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
        name: unifi-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: devicecom
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webapi
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8880
          name: httpredirects
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8843
          name: httpsredirects
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 6789
          name: speedtest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 10001
          name: apdiscovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 3478
          name: stun
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 1900
          name: appdiscovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 5514
          name: syslogcapture
          protocol: UDP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup mongodb.mongodb.svc.cluster.local; do echo waiting for mongodb;
          sleep 2; done;
        image: alpine
        name: wait-for-mongodb
      serviceAccountName: unifi-controller
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: unifi-controller-data

##### FILE: deployment6587.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment659.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to n8n/Deployment/n8n-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: n8n
    component: deployment
  name: n8n-deployment
  namespace: n8n
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
      component: deployment
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
        component: deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - sleep 5; n8n start
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        env:
        - name: N8N_SMTP_HOST
          value: email-smtp.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
        - name: N8N_SMTP_PORT
          value: "587"
        - name: N8N_SMTP_USER
          value: AKIAJ6SLTZFOHHZSTUKQ
        - name: N8N_SMTP_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: smtp
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: n8n-configmap
        image: n8nio/n8n:1.84.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /metrics
            port: 5678
        name: n8n
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /metrics
            port: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1.0"
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n/
          name: storage
      dnsConfig:
        nameservers:
        - 1.1.1.1
        - 1.0.0.1
      dnsPolicy: None
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown 1000:1000 /data
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-storage

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hemmelig:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: hemmelig
  name: hemmelig
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: hemmelig
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/hemmelig-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: hemmelig
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SECRET_FILE_SIZE
          value: "4"
        - name: SECRET_FORCED_LANGUAGE
          value: en
        - name: SECRET_HOST
          value: '!changeme!'
        - name: SECRET_JWT_SECRET
          value: '!changeme!'
        - name: SECRET_LOCAL_HOSTNAME
          value: 0.0.0.0
        - name: SECRET_MAX_TEXT_SIZE
          value: "256"
        - name: SECRET_PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: SECRET_ROOT_EMAIL
          value: groot@hemmelig.app
        - name: SECRET_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: iamroot
        - name: SECRET_ROOT_USER
          value: groot
        image: hemmeligapp/hemmelig:v5.19.17
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - wget -O /dev/null localhost:3000/api/healthz || exit 1
          failureThreshold: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: hemmelig
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          hostPort: 3002
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/tmp/hemmelig/upload/files
          name: hemmelig-claim0
        - mountPath: /home/node/hemmelig/database
          name: hemmelig-claim1
      hostname: hemmelig
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - name: hemmelig-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: hemmelig-claim0
      - name: hemmelig-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: hemmelig-claim1

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: pigallery2
  name: pigallery2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: pigallery2
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/pigallery-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: pigallery2
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: production
        image: bpatrik/pigallery2:latest
        name: pigallery2
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 3001
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data/config
          name: pigallery2-claim0
        - mountPath: /app/data/db
          name: pigallery2-claim1
        - mountPath: /app/data/images
          name: pigallery2-claim2
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /app/data/tmp
          name: pigallery2-claim3
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: pigallery2-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pigallery2-claim0
      - name: pigallery2-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pigallery2-claim1
      - name: pigallery2-claim2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pigallery2-claim2
          readOnly: true
      - name: pigallery2-claim3
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pigallery2-claim3

##### FILE: deployment660.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/relay:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: relay
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: relay
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: relay
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SMTP_PORT
          value: "587"
        - name: SMTP_SERVER
          value: email-smtp.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
        - name: SMTP_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: smtp
        - name: SMTP_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: smtp
        - name: SERVER_HOSTNAME
          value: whitestar.systems
        - name: SMTP_NETWORKS
          value: 0.0.0.0/0
        image: juanluisbaptiste/postfix:1.7.1
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 25
        name: relay
        ports:
        - containerPort: 25
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 25
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsUser: 0

---

    metadata:
      labels:
        run: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: us.icr.io/<my_namespace>/hello-world:1
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2m
            memory: 30Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 10Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: icr

---

##### FILE: deployment6607.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to unifi-controller/Deployment/unifi-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: unifi-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: unifi-controller
  name: unifi-controller
  namespace: unifi-controller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: unifi-controller
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: unifi-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        image: docker.io/mongo:7.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: unifi-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongo
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongo
            - --disableImplicitSessions
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: unifi-db
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/
          name: init-database
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: localhost
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: unifi-env
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/unifi-network-application:8.1.113-ls36
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: communication
        name: unifi-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3478
          name: stun
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 1001
          name: discovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: communication
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: web
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: unifi-config
      nodeSelector:
        worker: "true"
      volumes:
      - name: unifi-db
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: unifi-db
      - name: unifi-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: unifi-config
      - configMap:
          name: create-db-configmap
        name: init-database

---
